"Quick Search" is a search engine that locates files and folders by filename instantly for Windows.

Unlike Windows search, "Quick Search" initially displays every file and folder on your computer (hence the name "Quick Search").

You type in a search filter to limit what files and folders are displayed.


How long will it take to index my files?
"Quick Search" only indexes file and folder names and generally takes a few seconds to build its database.

A fresh installation of Windows 10 (about 120,000 files) will take about 1 second to index.

1,000,000 files will take about 1 minute.

9PKLF2W8J0TF.title: Umurangi Generation Special Edition
9PKLF2W8J0TF.description:
Umurangi Generation is a first-person photography game set in the retro future.

Set in Tauranga, Aotearoa off the back of an impending crisis, major cities are walled off, with the United Nations deploying the military and towering mecha to defend against an alien invasion.

From fighter jets beaming overhead, the sound of constant gunfire and wounded soldiers to the advertising boards in-game, everything you see provides more context to the daily lives of those in Tauranga.

Despite all of that, life goes on... People go to work, party to escape reality, complain about the government and the inequalities between the poor and the rich...

As a courier for the Tauranga Express, you get to travel around Tauranga taking pictures and documenting the world and its reality through the lenses of your camera. Throughout the game, you will unlock a variety of lenses and equipment.

*This version contains both the full PC version, its DLCs, as well as some additional modes.

‚ñº Unique and expressive grading system
Each photo you take is judged on its color, content and composition. Taking a photo will net you a cash score, which will go towards your final payout. Complete Photo Bounties any way you like. Once you've completed these bounties, deliver the parcel to finish the level.

‚ñº Exploration bonuses on each level
New equipment for your camera is unlocked by finding film canisters, recreating postcards, fulfilling timed deliveries, and finding a way to fit all of your friends in one photo.

‚ñº Full creative control
Edit your photos and develop your unique color grade. The tools in the game are flexible enough that you can touch up your photos to look better than when you took them. If you are an experienced photographer, you‚Äôll fit right in. If this is your first time, you‚Äôll be on your journey in no time.

‚ñº Speed run and creative modes
The game offers replayability through two special play modes. The speed run mode tests your gaming skills and is perfect for those up for a challenge. The creative mode, on the other hand, gives you full control over the creative side to achieve that perfect snap, sure to satisfy those of you avid photographers out there.

‚ñº What is an 'Umurangi'?
Umurangi is the Te Reo word for Red Sky.

9P2JHZT8WG7B.title: Web Camera Real-Time Objects Detection

Application detects and recognizes 20 categories of objects in real-time such as aero plane, bicycle, bird, boat, bottle, bus, car, cat, chair, cow, dining table, dog, horse, motorbike, person, potted plant, sheep, sofa, train and TV monitor.

Frames containing recognized objects are automatically saved as JPEG images to respective folders. 

Confidence level and pictures folder can be selected in application settings. 

Camera resolution can be selected from the list of all resolutions supported by particular camera and can be changed on the fly at any time. 

Camera settings are provided within the app to manage camera‚Äôs brightness, contrast, focus, hue, white balance, exposure, zoom, pan, tilt, rotation and backlight compensation. Application queries camera on the controls it supports and displays only those that are supported by each particular camera. 

Application works with any web camera as well as video capture cards. Connect TV box, game console or any other source of video input via USB or PCI video capture card and detect objects in the same manner. 

Application works fully autonomously (no Internet or cloud service required) since it incorporates built-in real-time neural network for object detection and utilizes Windows 10/11 built-in AI Machine Learning functionality with the above mentioned model.  

This is Universal Windows Platform application therefore no other frameworks or helpers are needed or installed on your machine, only this app as one package from the Microsoft Store. 

Application can work unlimited time on your machine, 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. It does not require much processing power so that you can use your PC as usual when the application works. It automatically adjusts its performance based on the performance of your machine.

9MXCC2X4TFQW.title: Blu-ray disc security
9MXCC2X4TFQW.description:
This is a simple security program that hides the contents of a BD-RE Disc by making it recognized as blank disc.

After security processing, the computer recognizes that disc as an empty blank disc, so that the contents of it cannot be seen.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
BD-RE discs can be used as external storage media in the same way as external hard disks or USB drives.

If BD-RE Disc is formatted in UDF format, it can be used in the same way as reading and writing files on a hard disk.
 

Using Blu-ray Disc as a external storage medium has the following advantages:

In the case of hard disks, mechanical failures can occur at any time and are also affected by magnetic objects. In that case, data may be lost.

Flash storage media such as USB drives and memory cards can also fail at any time, resulting in loss of all stored data.

On the other hand, Blu-ray disc can safely store data for a long period of time and is cheaper than other storage media, so it is suitable for secondary backup purposes.

And, there are several good products, slim Blu-ray drives that can be used for laptops, notebook computers.

This program performs simple security targeting BD-RE discs.


BD-RE: Read/Write Blu-ray disc  (RE: Recordable Erasable)

9NFVVCQWR0VR.title: Complex Text Encryption
9NFVVCQWR0VR.description:
Application implements substitution cypher technology to encrypt and decrypt text. Use this app to communicate privately as no one else. 

The app is a symmetric key cryptography also known as secret key cryptography technology.

User creates a key up to 100 MB, which is a binary file containing keys, and privately shares key with other users. Using the same key, users can encrypt and decrypt text messages. It is recommended that the same key of standard size is used for encrypting up to 4x10^12 characters in total with any single message containing no more than 2 million characters.

Application uses Windows-1251 encoding that covers Latin, Cyrillic and special characters. Every character has 1.5x10^10 keys generated on random basis on key creation. There is also a representation layer containing numbers displayed in encrypted message. The numbers in this layer are part of the key and are used for visual representation of the encrypted message. Every time the message is encrypted, the same numbers are used to represent different characters making sure no writing patterns exist in encrypted message.
